Articles.Content: Hello. I'm new here on the forums. I don't know if this has been mentioned before, or talked about, but I would really appreciate being able to float around a spaceship in kerbal POV in order to set experiments and control the inner ship, etc. I don't know what will go into making such a feature, or if it's too late. I would be really interested in a response of how feasible this is and if it is a good idea.
Sounds like a pretty cool idea. Of course for the time being there's the FreeIVA mod, but it's a little under-developed and doesn't have all the functionality you mentioned. +1
It would be really nice to see expanded IVA functionality. I hope that they'll have support for both cockpit instrumentation and walking/floating around inside them.
